isis.stitle: SPICER 14-INCH (355.6 MM) STAMPED ANGLE-SPRING CLUTCH - ADJUSTMENT INSTRUCTIONS - LINKAGE ADJUSTMENT FOR BOTH MANUAL AND SELF-ADJUSTING CLUTCHES

svcproc.title: LINKAGE ADJUSTMENT FOR BOTH MANUAL AND SELF-ADJUSTING CLUTCHES

step1.para: Measure the clearance between the release yoke fingers and the wear pads on the release bearing housing (Free Travel) on both sides of the housing simultaneously.
If the clearance is greater than or less than 1/8", either shorten or lengthen the external linkage to obtain 1/8" clearance ( Figure 54).

This dimension should correlate to a Free Pedal of approximately 1 1/2" to 2" in the cab ( Figure 55). If it doesn't, fine tune the adjustment to obtain proper dimension. Refer to GROUP 11 - LINKAGE in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for the type vehicle being serviced.
Apply a small amount of grease between the release bearing wear pads and the clutch release fork. Repeat this at normal service intervals.
